eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Arizona; at 02:27 PM ON DEC 15, 2025 Effective until 10:27 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for Flagstaff, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Flagstaff Police Department is looking for 71-year-old George William Jackson Sr. He is five feet eight inches tall, 150 pounds with brown hair and green eyes. George was last seen on Thursday, 12/11/2025 around 12:40 PM near 3000 E. Route 66 in Flagstaff, Arizona. He was seen wearing blue jeans, a purple shirt, a brown jacket and glasses. George can possibly be driving a blue 1987 Chevrolet El Camino with Arizona license plate of C F P 6 7 1 1. George suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to be lost or confused. Any information on George Jackson, please contact the Flagstaff Police Department.

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
